shortdesc.ph: Request status codes for the music content center.

plentry.pd: (1): General error with no specific reason.
(2): Gateway error. Possible reasons include: Token expired, please regenerate it; Token is invalid, make sure you are using an RTM Token; Network error, please check your network connection.
(3): Permission error or music resource not found. Make sure the music content center feature is enabled for your project. Contact technical support if you need help.
(4): Internal data parsing error. Contact technical support if you need help.
(5): Error occurred while loading music resources. Contact technical support if you need help.
(6): Error occurred while decrypting music resources. Contact technical support if you need help.
(7): Internal HTTP error. Please try again later.
